translation.en: What's up, Grandpa? Where you going?
[gasps] Holy fuck! Who the fuck is that?
-Oh. -Hey, it's me! It's me, it's me.
-What the fuck are you doing here? -It's me.
-[laughs] What? -You scared the shit out of me.
Sorry, sorry, sorry, all right? Don't freak out.
I can't stand it when you do that!
Hey, so when is your dad's birthday again?
Uh, November 9th.
Cool, cool, okay. Yeah, I got a fun gift idea for him.
What? Which one?
Yeah, I'm gonna get him these, like, Omaha Steaks.
-You know... you know about Omaha Steaks? -Oh.
Um, yeah.
Yeah. Like, they put 'em in a box... -Mmm-hmm. -...they send 'em off,
and then you take 'em out of the box and throw 'em on a grill.
translation.ko: 우린 그냥 꺼내서 굽기만 하면 돼

translation.en: I'm gonna send your dad, like, a couple dozen.
-I think he'll like it. -Cool.
-I'll just-- -Don't touch my feet.
What? Come on, you know you like that when I touch your feet.
-Come on-- -Don't touch my feet. I just think, it'd be good. [stutters]
I need you back. I need you to take care of me.
And... and I was thinking about us...
[stammers] and... about my heart and how I feel about you.
Come on, I know you. And I love you and you're so hot.
And I just... I need you, Mama.
Fine. Just shut the fuck up! I'll fuck you, but then you have to go.
translation.ko: 알았어, 대줄 테니까 끝나면 바로 가

translation.en: -You're not sleeping here tonight. -Yeah, that's cool.
translation.ko: - 자는 건 안 돼 - 그래도 좋아

translation.en: I was looking at this website... -Mmm-hmm. -...and I found this rug.
translation.ko: 여기 쇼핑몰 보다가 카펫 하나 발견했는데

translation.en: I thought it would look really good in your living room.
Oh, yeah.
Yeah, I like that orange one. It's nice.
I was thinking the blue one.
Sure. Blue works, too.
Yeah, I mean, either/or...
Orange or blue, whatever one you're standing on,
it's gonna look good.
I was thinking about that, um... you know the blue rug.
Maybe we don't get it, like, for my place, but...
Like, what if we got it for, like, our place?
translation.ko: 우리가 같이 쓰는 게 좋지 않을까?

translation.en: You wanna move in together?
-Yeah. -Yeah.
-I mean, do you? Do you-- -Yeah.
-You wanna move in? -Yeah.
-[moans] -Let's move in together.
-Yes! -I am God's warrior!
-Yes, you are! Yes, you are! -[yelling]
I'm gonna come. I'm gonna come.
I'm comin'. I'm comin'.
[Eric] Do you remember that little...
The travel-size Connect Four? Do you remember that game?
What? Why?
I just wanna... I wanna play a game from my youth, you know?
translation.ko: 어릴 때 했던 놀이가 하고 싶어

translation.en: Nobody has the attention span anymore to just sit and play a game.
What about Operation? Remember Operation?
[mimics electrocution] Ah, shit.
Why can't we just sit anymore?
Maybe that's 'cause you're coked up.
That's not it, all right? Okay, let's--
Nobody can just sit and read a book anymore.
Nobody just sits and reads a book-- All right, you know what? We'll...
translation.ko: 가만히 앉아 책 읽는 게 어려워?

translation.en: Let's both read books, and we'll see who gets distracted first.
translation.ko: 우리 독서 내기하자 누가 먼저 딴청 피우나

translation.en: We'll see... we'll see who's gonna do that.
I'm not gonna read with you, Eric.
All right, this is what we'll do.
I'm gonna read Crime and Punishment, all right?
And you'll read Cujo, all right? That's what we'll do.
And we'll see who can read the most pages without getting distracted.
translation.ko: 딴짓 안 하고 누가 많이 읽나

translation.en: Ready to do that? Let's do that, okay?
Cocaine, no cocaine, my attention will not be challenged.
You got a real drug problem, Eric.
What's that?
Well, these are the drugs I have to take to deal with you.
All right, ready? No distractions, all right?
Just read. No distractions. No.
We just get right into it. We just get...
Just right into it. We're just gonna get right into it, all right?
-Ow! [laughs] Ow, God. -Ow! [groans]
-Fuck... ow. -Didn't know your knee was there.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm okay.
Okay.
Hey, I love you. Okay?
What's the matter? What's wrong?
You say "I love you" too much.
-Do I? -Yeah.
Okay. Well, I'm, like, so sorry to be affectionate to you.
translation.ko: 널 사랑해서 그런 건데 미안하다고 해야겠네

translation.en: -I guess that's-- -No, it's not affection, it's pressure.
Because then if I don't say it back then it becomes a thing.
Well, why wouldn't you say it back?
I mean, if it's true you would say it, right?
'Cause I, like, I love you.
Oh, my God, please stop saying that.
-Okay, well, I do. I love you-- -Okay, stop it!
-I love you. -Stop it.
-What is the fucking problem? -Gus, please shut up!
I love you. God damn it! What is the matter?
-[groans] -What? Just fucking say it.
I fucked another guy! [sighs]
Well, you know, just so you know, like...
because we're broken up, that means, like, we're not talking anymore, you know?
So you can, like, text, and you can call and, like, email me,
translation.ko: 네가 문자 날리고 전화질에 이메일을 해도

translation.en: but I'm not, like, gonna reply, okay?
-So, like, once you're out, you're out. -So we're never gonna talk again?
translation.ko: - 헤어지면 끝이야 - 다신 연락 안 해?

translation.en: No, because you fucked another guy, okay?
I can't imagine that... that you're just gonna be around and you're not gonna be in my life.
translation.ko: 내 삶에 네가 없는 건 상상이 안 돼

translation.en: I mean, like...
obviously, we're still gonna be friends, okay?
-[screaming] No! -What the fuck?
This is what I'm fucking talking about!
Well, what am I?
Am I too nice? Am I too mean?
Yes, you're too fucking-- You're not nice!
You're... you're fucking fake nice, which is worse than being mean!
translation.ko: 착한 척이나 하고 그게 더 나빠!

translation.en: You know, it's over. I get that.
It's fucking over and it's done.
[sighs] I just want you to be true to yourself.
Okay, being true to myself?
-Yeah. -I want you to fucking die.
Okay? I want you to fucking get a disease and die,
or fucking get in a car accident and die.
That's what I want, I want you to fucking die.
It's over.
-[car horn honking] -Oh, shit.
-What? What's wrong? -[sighs] We just gotta go quicker.
-Why? What the fuck? -[moaning]
-My mom's here. -What the fuck?
-Why is your mom here? -Oh, just go quicker.
-Come with me, come with me. -No, I can't. I can't just do that.
-You're like-- -[grunting]
What the fuck, dude? That's really lame.
Oh. Well, I just...
I got stuff to do today, you know? Gettin' it together.
You're really going right now?
What? Yeah. Yeah, she's taking me to buy pants and I totally forgot.
translation.ko: 응, 울 엄마가 바지 사준다고 했거든

translation.en: What the fuck?
-You can't but your own pants? -She offered.
It's not cute that you live with your parents, Eric.
You tell people it's some sort of life hack, but it's just sad.
It's sad to want new pants?
All right, I'm sorry, I'm a human being, all right?
Eventually, I'm gonna need pants.
[scoffs] Wait, you're going? You're actually going? Eric!
I don't even know why it's something you get pissed off about.
-I need new pants. What's wrong with you? -Eric, fucking, you wait!
Don't get in that car. You were just fucking me--
[Mrs. Todd] Good morning, Mickey.
Hi, Mrs. Todd.
Hey, me and Eric are going to that new mall in Topanga.
Don't get in the fucking car, dude.
I'm so tired of you acting like a fucking child.
If you get in that car with your mom, then you're a fucking loser.
translation.ko: 엄마 차 타고 가면 쪼다 되는 거야

translation.en: Snore, snore, snore.
You're putting me to sleep, Ma. You're boring me to death right now, okay?
translation.ko: 네 잔소리 땜에 잠 올라 그런다

translation.en: You think I'm a fucking child? You think I'm a fucking loser?
Well, bullshit, all right? You're just as fucked up as me.
The difference is I have the balls to admit it.
translation.ko: 난 내가 못난 거 인정은 한다

translation.en: Ma, let's go!
Eric, honey. Honey... why don't you invite your friend Mickey
translation.ko: 에릭, 그러지 말고 미키는 네 친구니까

translation.en: and we will go and get the slacks at the mall together?
He's not my friend. His cum is still inside of me.
translation.ko: 친구 아니에요 방금 나랑 떡 쳤다고요

translation.en: Eric, it's over!
[Eric] Who even talks to somebody's mother like that?
I'm open.
-Got you. -[girl chuckles]
[narrator on TV] Retaining a harem of over 100 females
translation.ko: 백 마리가 넘는 암컷을 지키기 위해

translation.en: will require him to fight many challengers... [thud]
translation.ko: 수컷은 하루에도 수십 번 결투를 벌입니다

translation.en: [boy] Hey, um... a little help?
[narrator on TV] Elephant seal pups in such a hostile environment
can sometimes get caught in the middle of these riots,
putting them in harm's way.
-Oh... Hey. -[boy] Hey, sorry about that, man.
[Gus] Oh, sorry?
Who cares, guys? It's fine.
Have fun, you know?
Here you go. Oop, sorry.
Cool.
So you guys are up... [sighs] early, huh? You on spring break or...
-Oh, this is study abroad. -In Los Angeles, huh?
The college, they put us up at the Springwood for a semester.
Yeah, since this shithole is basically, like, one step up from a dorm room.
translation.ko: 여기 주민들이 기숙사보다 한 수 위거든요

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna miss all the drug dealers
and child actors and the sad divorced guys.
Well, I'll let you get back to your Fris-ing.
Well, hey, man, we're having a kickback tonight by the pool.
You should drop by.
Yeah. Yeah, maybe. We'll see, we'll see.
[Mickey] So that's the bathroom, we have to share it.
-[woman] Oh, okay. -My mom gave me that stupid thing.
-It's nice. Uh-huh. -Um, that's the kitchen.
-Do you cook? -Uh, a little here and there.
-Baking... -Huh?
You never really hear about an Australian style of cuisine.
No, there isn't any.
-[cat meows] -Hmm. [gasps] No, bad, bad.
-Aw. Who's the kitty? -Ugh, sorry about that.
Oh, God. Are you allergic to cats?
No, no, no, I love cats. What's his name?
His name's Grandpa.
I named him that 'cause he's a reincarnation of my grandpa.
-Cute. -So what do you think?
Of your, uh... Oh, here?
[stutters] Yeah. It's good, I like it.
So you wanna move in?
Um... oh, really?
Yeah, I mean, you don't seem crazy
translation.ko: 네, 그쪽이 이상한 사람 같진 않고

translation.en: and I don't feel like meeting with a ton of people. So?
translation.ko: 이 사람 저 사람 만나기도 싫거든요

translation.en: Wow, okay. Great.
Great. I'll text that other girl and tell her to not to come over.
translation.ko: 그럼 다음 사람한테 오지 말라고 할게요

translation.en: You snooze, you lose.
Cool. So were you, like, living with another roommate, or...
I mean, my boyfriend kind of lived here with me.
It was sort of on and off. He'd come and go.
translation.ko: 들어올 때도 있고 아닐 때도 있고

translation.en: He'd mainly live with his parents, but... then we broke up, so whatever. [scoffs]
Oh, um, I'm so sorry.
Don't be. I'm so glad we broke up...
I just don't really wanna live alone, you know?
Well, that's perfect. We can hang out.
And we will.
I just wanna really clearly establish the roommate boundaries initially.
translation.ko: 그래도 서로 사생활은 확실히 보장하는 걸로

translation.en: [stuttering] Yeah. Yeah.
That actually sounds like we've got a lot in common.
Well... [smacks lips]
get out of my space! [chuckles]
This is gonna be fun.
But, Mother, why is the wolf following me?
translation.ko: 엄마, 이 늑대가 왜 절 쫓아와요?

translation.en: Do not fear him. He is your protector.
Now that you're becoming a woman, your powers are growing.
translation.ko: 너도 여자가 되면 네 힘이 강해질 거야

translation.en: My powers? Am I becoming a witch?
We will know soon enough.
When your body aligns with the lunar cycle.
translation.ko: 네 몸이 달 주기를 따를 때

translation.en: Now, command the wolf.
-[inhales sharply] -Sabien, submit.
He's not even looking at me.
Uh, cut!
All right, let's get the wolf to sit. How about that? What's the problem?
Arya, you have to make your hand a fist or the wolf won't sit.
I was.
No, actually, you were just holding your hand up.
Are you blind or something?
I was doing exactly what you said to. The dog's just stupid.
translation.ko: 난 주먹 쥐었는데 개가 안 한 거예요

translation.en: God, just check the playback, I was doing it.
Arya, superstar, what up?
[groaning] I'm so tired!
-Evan. -Hey, what's up, man?
Hey, man. What's going on?
Not much. What do you need?
-Tutor time. -Seriously? You're doing this now?
Dude, have you been paying attention? We lose the wolf in half an hour.
No, I get it. I just... you know...
Arya needs her three hours of class...
-every day. -Right.
I'm dealing with a child actor and a live animal here.
I-- I just need you to be a team player.
I know. But I feel like it's always
animals that are coming in and push, you know...
translation.ko: 그런데 항상 동물만 등장하면 시간에 쫓겨서요 저번엔 뱀이더니...

translation.en: One day it's snakes, the next day it's--
Dude, have you ever worked on a supernatural period piece before?
Come on, man. Everyday there's a serpent or there's a mule.
translation.ko: 그래도 이건 뭐 맨날 뱀 아니면 노새니

translation.en: I'm looking out for Arya here, okay?
I don't know what to tell you, man. They're witches, they deal with animals.
Evan, she needs three hours of class every day, okay?
translation.ko: 아리야는 매일 세 시간 수업해야 해요

translation.en: So we're doing this.
Seriously? That's the tone you're gonna take?
Yeah, come on, man. It's the law.
-It's called working-- -What's going on?
-Is there an issue? -Susan, hey.
Uh, no issues.
Lovin' the scene, it's so good.
Guys, this wolf is almost out the door.
-Can we handle this some other time? -[Evan] Yes.
Right, but it's just--
If Arya's not in class
and somebody reports this, we could lose our jobs and--
[scoffs] Dude, you are the only one that cares about--
But we could. We could lose our jobs!
Hey, hey, hey. Why are we going crazy here?
translation.ko: 진정들 해 왜 열 내고 난리야?

translation.en: Gus, listen.
I respect your passion and commitment here.
-Thank you. Thank you. -[Susan] You know?
Yeah, and, you know, and if the wolf goes away before we get this shot, you know, that's... that's fine.
translation.ko: 저 장면 못 끝내도 아무 상관 없어

translation.en: You know, we'll... we'll work it out.
That means so much. I appreciate that. Thank you.
What would that mean, Evan?
I'm guessing we just have to come in on Saturday to finish?
Uh-huh. Yeah.
Yeah, just come in over the weekend.
-Yep. Mmm-hmm. -Mmm.
The crew will probably not like that much.
[Evan] Oh, they're gonna be pissed.
I mean, I guess you don't give a fuck about
people spending time with their kids. Oh, wait, you don't have kids.
-[Evan] That's for sure. -Uh...
I feel like we're wasting time by arguing about it, so...
[inhales] Let's just do it.
-Really? Excellent. -[Gus] We'll do it. Mmm-hmm.
You're my soldier.
All right, we got another take, everybody. Second take.
Uh, why does everyone else get a CGI wolf? Why the fuck do we have a real wolf here?
translation.ko: 다른 덴 다 CG 넣잖아 왜 우리만 진짜 늑대야?

translation.en: Arya, hey. False alarm.
It's gonna be about 50 more minutes. And then, we'll take it to class.
I can't. I need a nap.
[clicks tongue] Nope. No naps today.
-I've been here since 6:00. -I know that.
But how you gonna count all that money you got if, uh, you don't know math, right?
Um, Jeff, the accountant?
Right, Jeff.
He's an Orthodox Jew, I think he knows what he's doing.
[man on radio] Our next caller is Jason from Chicago.
translation.ko: 시카고에서 전화 주신 제이슨 씨를 만나보죠

translation.en: Jason, how we doin'? How's our day going?
[Jason] Well, my mom passed away.
Oh. My condolences.
I have to say, I'm not too torn up about it,
translation.ko: - 조의를 표합니다 - 그런데 엄청 슬프지가 않아요

translation.en: and actually, that's what's kind of got me upset.
The fact that I'm not upset.
We can't control how we feel.
And sometimes... [inhales]
these archetypical people in our lives, they hurt us.
And they don't fulfill the archetype.
What... what's an archetype?
An archetype is a...
Well, I don't really have the exact definition.
I do know what it means, obviously, because I just used it. Um...
Well, thank you so much for calling.
I am Dr. Greg Coulter
and you are listening to the Love and Living Channel
translation.ko: 러브 앤 리빙 채널과 함께하고 계십니다

translation.en: on Gravity Satellite Radio.
You listen, we hear.
Great. Great show, Greg.
[Dr. Greg] Oh, thanks so much, Rob.
-I really appreciate it. -So good.
-Good morning, Mickey. -Hey, you said you wanted to talk?
Yeah.
We need to fire Rob. Rob's gotta go. Does that make me evil?
No! Please. This is a business.
You know what?
Can you fire him for me... huh?
-Or do program managers not do that? -[sighs]
translation.ko: 프로그램 매니저는 그런 거 안 해요?

translation.en: What? I mean, okay, you know what? I'll do it.
If you do it, Rob will think I'm a coward.
Yeah, I think that's probably the right move.
No, wait, you know what? You do it.
I'm sorry, I'll stop being annoying.
So what's the problem? What did he do?
Look... Rob does a great job...
but the guy creeps me out.
He's got this look in his eyes. You ever meet a person
and they smile, and you feel like they're screaming at you?
What? Rob?
Rob's like the nicest guy in the whole world.
He's nicer than both of us.
Well, he's just got this bad energy, this aura around him.
translation.ko: 롭한테 속는 거예요 나쁜 기운이 흘러요

translation.en: Has he ever done anything to you?
He asked me do I like him.
That's weird, right? That's not a thing you ask anybody.
-Let alone in a workplace. -[sighs]
Look... I would fire him but I can't take that on right now.
translation.ko: 내가 자르고 싶지만 감당이 안 된다고요

translation.en: This might be a difficult thing for you to understand
but I am very vulnerable in this job.
I have to be.
I make myself vulnerable to the world.
I can't be vulnerable around somebody like Rob.
So he's gotta go.
Fine, I'll do it just to end this conversation.
translation.ko: 이런 말 듣고 있느니 내가 자를래요

translation.en: I'm a pussy, aren't I?
I'm sorry, I'm disgusting.
Okay, you know what? I'll do it.
-[whispers] Thank you. -Oh, question.
What is a good band to work out to? Something new.
[exhales] I don't know. The Monkees?
That's great. [chuckles]
Thanks, you're the best. You know what?
You fire Rob.
[woman] So how was the move out of the Springwood?
Uh, you know, it's funny it didn't end up actually happening.
He finally realizes that the Springwood rules.
You love it there, right?
No. I mean... not exactly.
You can live anywhere in LA!
Okay, like, where?
I mean... [stutters] I've been looking, but it's just...
I'm having a hard time finding a place I like.
translation.ko: 마음에 드는 곳이 한 군데도 없어

translation.en: You can move near me. The Eastside.
I don't know. It's just a little too cool. And now...
I'd be like the Beverly Hills guy with, like, a white Corvette.
[clears throat] I mean, is that what we're doing?
[stammers] We're just playing what we'd wanna be?
I don't think it's, like, what I want to be. It's, like, who I am.
translation.ko: 꿈 얘기가 아니고 지금의 나 얘기야

translation.en: Like, who am I?
I mean, like, where do guys like me live, you know?
Where do the, like, repressed hostile nerds
translation.ko: 화도 잘 못 내고 찌질한 샌님에

translation.en: whose girlfriend's accuse them of being "fake nice" live?
-Santa Monica? -No.
As long as I stay in the Springwood, you know...
maybe I get a text from Natalie saying, "Let's try it again."
translation.ko: 언젠가 나탈리가 다시 합치자고 그럴 때

translation.en: And I can just bop out of the Springwood back to another place
instead of like, bop Springwood, bop new place, bop Natalie.
translation.ko: 안 그럼 딴 데 갔다가 또 나탈리네로 가고

translation.en: It's crazy, right?
Please don't tell me you think you and Natalie are gonna get back together.
-'Cause that's never gonna happen. -Yeah.
You're saying it... like, it's over?
She cheated on you. Why would you wanna be with her?
Gus, she sucked, man.
[woman] Fuck Natalie. And fuck the Springwood.
I think you'll find someone better.
[stammers] You know, I know you'll find someone better
and if you have trouble, I can set you up.
She wasn't right for you, dude.
I think I gotta go.
Gus. Wait. We gotta...
[sighs] We gotta pay.
Otis, put the dirt down now!
I suppose it's better than Heather's kid. -She eats dog shit. -[snorts]
[laughs] I'm serious.
Oh, my God, this day is dragging.
You know what my favorite part of the day is?
translation.ko: 난 하루 중 제일 좋을 때가

translation.en: [sighs] Taking my Ambien.
-Really? -Yeah.
There's this moment right after it kicks in,
and I'm still awake and everything is perfect.
translation.ko: 내가 깨어 있으면 모든 게 완벽해 보여

translation.en: Seriously, I look forward to 9:30 every day.
I don't like that shit.
I always wake up having made spaghetti.
[chuckling] Spaghetti is the best. What's wrong with that?
You want some Ambien?
No, thanks. [sighs]
Are you sober?
Kinda.
I get it.
Fuck it! Give me some Ambien. Give me a whole handful.
translation.ko: 젠장! 이리 줘봐요 한 움큼 가득

translation.en: [inhales sharply] All right.
I'm sure you have your own methods... but I turn off all electronic devices.
translation.ko: 나름 방식이 있겠지만 난 전자기기는 다 꺼

translation.en: The last time I took an Ambien, I emailed my high school principal
translation.ko: 전에 수면제 먹고 내 고등학교 교장한테

translation.en: to tell him what a great job he had done.
translation.ko: 참 훌륭한 일 하셨다고 이메일 보냈어

translation.en: [chuckles softly] That's why you're my favorite neighbor.
Otis, enough with the dirt.
You have reached your quota.
Down.
You know, I guess she used to be an extra on The Little Rascals.
For real?
-Yeah, no, she told me that. -[man] Jeez.
-Hey, what's going on? -Hey.
What's happening here?
This old lady in E-2021 died.
I guess she fell in the shower
and the water kept running on her body for, like, a week,
so when they found her, the bathtub was full of mush.
translation.ko: 경찰이 발견했을 땐 욕조가 곤죽이 됐더래

translation.en: Jesus! [softly] What... What?
I told you not to give details.
Yeah, well, you're the one who gave me the details.
She lived here for 42 years, man.
-[whispers] Wow. -[softly] Yeah.
How long have you guys lived here? Eighteen years.
They're roommates but they're not gay.
Yeah, Chris, I don't care. That's fine.
Why, did you think we were gay?
We're best friends. This is my BFF. We're roomies.
Yeah, no, he said... I didn't.
I don't even care. It's fine.
Nice to meet you.
-Yep. -Take it easy.
Later, dudes.
Hey, we're not gonna wind up like those two guys, are we?
I hope so.
We should be so fucking lucky.
Thirty years of friendship?
We should be so fucking lucky, Gus.
Fuck it.
[sighs heavily] Shit.
translation.ko: “미안, 용서해줘” 젠장 “축복의 집으로 와 윌튼 가 3294”

translation.en: You know what I love about Uber?
You don't have to tip.
Fuck taxis, man. Uber's changing the world.
And you own this car, right?
It's, like, a nice car.
-Yes, ma'am. -[cell phone chimes]
[softly] Oh, shit! Oh, fuck! Shit!
[Rob on phone] Hello, this is Rob.
Hi, this is Mickey Dobbs, the program manager from work.
translation.ko: 저 미키 돕스예요 라디오 프로그램 매니저요

translation.en: Uh, anyway, you know that. [chuckles]
Um, I didn't...
Uh, I don't wanna do this over voicemail, but, um...
Hello?
Hello? Is this...
is this one of those trick voicemail things?
Mickey, is that you?
God! Sorry! Your voice doesn't normally sound so message-y.
[chuckles] No, it's me.
We're gonna put Frozen on in one second, honey, I promise.
Is everything okay?
Um... I don't know how to say this, uh...
I'm just gonna... I'm just gonna come right out
and say it to you, 'cause I respect you, okay, Rob?
You are fired from, you know, work.
[scoffs] What?
Greg told you to fire me?
Yeah. Aw.
But... it's nothing personal.
Sure, it's not personal.
You're just Dr. Greg's little henchman, that's all.
Oh, come on, man. Aren't we all henchmen?
"Aren't we all henchmen?" What the fuck does that mean?
Are you high right now?
Are you on drugs?
-Drugs? -[car horns honking]
Oh, so you're firing me over the phone while you drive on drugs?
That's great. Why don't you show my daughter that?
Tell my six-year-old daughter that. Go ahead.
Hey, look, I drew a big star.
Oh, she drew a big star... [whispering] you fucking cock-whore!
Whoa, dude, uncalled for! Shit!
[Eric] Mickey.
-What the fuck are you wearing? -Aw.
I'm glad you made it.
This is a really weird bar.
It's not a bar. You haven't heard of Bliss House?
No. What is this, like, a...
like, a club for old people?
It's a church. Well, they say it's... like a church for all churches, you know.
It's more about oneness and togetherness, not so much a higher being.
translation.ko: 높으신 분 모시기보다 공동체 의식을 키우지

translation.en: But I'm... I'm trying to say I'm sorry, all right?
This is... this is how I'm trying to say I'm sorry to you.
The midnight service is the best one.
-You're gonna love it. -Fuck, no.
Dude, no, no, I can't do that.
I'm wearing, like, a one-piece under jeans.
Hey! Our buddy from the balcony!
Hey, what's up? You guys! All right. There you are.
You dropped by. You even brought your work backpack.
I'm Gus, by the way.
-I'm Nate. Good to meet you. -Hello. Hi.
-Hey, I'm Hailey. -Did you get a drink yet, man?
Uh, you know what?
Yeah. Give me a beer.
-Give you a-- -[Gus] Yeah, give me a beer. Cool.
Yeah, all right. Okay.
-Beer. [chuckles] -Thank you. Thanks.
-Cheers. -Yeah.
Good evening, blessed specimens of this lifetime.
How are you all feeling? I wanna hear you.
Tonight, we stand together
in a vibratory field of an advancing potential,
the foundation of which is love.
Love doesn't just happen, we have to choose it.
We are in a phase of evolution where we have to agree with love.
translation.ko: 우리는 진화한 인간으로서 사랑을 수긍해야 합니다

translation.en: We are in a phase of evolution where we have to embrace love.
translation.ko: 우리는 진화한 인간으로서 사랑을 포용해야 합니다

translation.en: We have to see love, feel love, touch love, heal love.
translation.ko: 사랑을 보고 느끼고 만지며 치유해야 합니다

translation.en: From the very core of our inner sanction.
Right? You guys know what I'm talking about.
-Come on, let me hear you. -[applause]
Holy fuck.
You guys are doing it right. Seriously.
All of you guys, this is, like, what your twenties should be about.
Having fun, going wild.
Ever since I was a little kid, I've been acting like a grown-up.
And now, it's like, I'm in my thirties,
and I'm, like...
"Oh, my God!"
I need to make up for lost time.
Hey, let's get fucking crazy tonight!
Will you shut the fuck up?
This is a family community.
Families live here. This isn't fucking Club Med!
Hey! Uh, why don't you just, uh,
let us enjoy this one special moment in our lives...
translation.ko: 우린 특별한 순간을 즐기고 있는 거야

translation.en: before we, you know, fucking slip in a shower and turn to mush?
translation.ko: 누구처럼 욕조에 빠져 곤죽 되기 전에

translation.en: Go fuck yourself, man!
-I love you guys! -[cheering]
I love this place!
Guys, thank you so much.
So fun. Really--
-You're the man, Gus. -[Gus] You guys are...
-All right, we'll see you tomorrow. -See you tomorrow.
Hey, what are you doing now?
Me? Um, sawing some logs. [chuckles]
What... What does... What does that mean? I don't know what that means.
It means sleeping. It's like an old expression for sleeping.
-Oh. [chuckles] -Well, uh--
We still have a couple of hours to kill. Do you wanna hang out at your place?
translation.ko: 좀 더 놀 건데 거스 집에 가도 돼요?

translation.en: Yeah. Well, okay. It's a little messy, if that's cool.
[Hailey] Oh, God, it's fine.
Oh, my God! Your bedroom is literally identical to ours.
-No way. Really? [chuckles] -Yeah. It's so lame, right?
Hey, look at these candles!
-They've never even been lit. -[Hailey laughs] So lame.
It's crazy they have all the same stuff in every...
-Yeah. -I know.
-It's nuts. -It's, uh... They're like clones.
-They're clones of each other. -[sighs] -[girl] Clones. -[chuckles]
I'm gonna miss it though.
It sucks that we have to leave and fly back.
-[Gus] Uh... -We wanna move to LA after college.
-Ooh. -Oh, really?
-Yeah. [chuckles] -Oh, that's cool.
Yeah, 'cause we never did anything fun while we were here.
translation.ko: 여기 있는 동안 못 해본 게 많아요

translation.en: We had all these, like, wild, crazy plans.
-[laughs] -Oh, really? Like what?
You guys wanted to go to Six Flags or something, right?
-[girl] No. -[all laugh]
No, like, um... [clicks tongue]
I don't know, uh... [sighs]
-Never mind. -[both chuckle]
-You guys are-- -We, uh...
We... we kinda...
-[chuckles] -We wanted to have a three-way.
Oh. Oh, okay.
Yeah.
-Yeah. [chuckles] Uh, have-- -Yeah.
Have you ever had one?
Uh, no. [smacks lips]
-Mmm. Okay. -I... I don't think I have. No.
-No, haven't had a three-way. -[all chuckles]
Well, um, I know Reese hasn't...
-No? Right. [chuckles] -...and I haven't, and, uh...
-And I-- Yeah, I haven't. Yeah. no. -And... you haven't.
So, yeah.
Um, so, is... is it happening?
Now, is this it? This is the three-way? Yeah?
-Yes, Gus. -Okay.
I think that was clear.
Cool.
Children, please, step inside our vibratory field of energy and love
translation.ko: 아이에게 이 전당의 에너지와 사랑을 전달하고

translation.en: and receive our message.
Remember, if you ask the world for love, you will receive love.
translation.ko: 사랑을 구하는 자는 사랑을 얻을 것입니다

translation.en: All of tonight's newcomers, please rise.
Come on. I know-- I know you're digging this.
All right, fuck it. [scoffs]
We speak from our eyes and say, welcome home.
[all] "Welcome home."
-[man] We love you. -[all] "We love you."
We walk in your hearts, and embrace your soul.
[all] "We walk in your hearts, and embrace your soul."
Please, welcome our newcomers.
This brings our service to an end.
If you didn't get a chance to donate, the tithing baskets are up front.
[Mickey] Can I ask something?
Yes.
Excuse me. Sorry. Excuse me.
[man] Speak what's in your heart.
Hi, guys. Sorry, I'm on Ambien, so it's, um...
You said earlier that if you ask for love, the world will send you love back.
translation.ko: 아까 사랑을 구하면 얻을 거라고 하셨는데

translation.en: But I've been asking and asking,
and I haven't gotten fucking anything.
Hoping and waiting and wishing and wanting love...
Hoping... hoping for love has fucking ruined my life.
And you're right, Eric. I am a fuck-up.
I'm really sorry.
But I refuse to believe
that all those dipshits I went to high school with,
who are married now and putting pictures on Facebook every day
translation.ko: 벌써 결혼해서 애 낳고 페이스북에다 맨날

translation.en: of their kids in little headbands have it all figured out, right?
translation.ko: 애들 사진 올리면서 잘 산다고 뻐겨

translation.en: That's gotta be bullshit.
That can't be the deal. That can't be it.
translation.ko: 어떻게 인생이 그래요? 그러면 안 되죠

translation.en: I know it's, like, not appropriate to be standing up here in a bathing suit...
translation.ko: 수영복이나 입고 여기 서면 안 되는 건데

translation.en: but I took an Ambien tonight.
I... I was supposed to go to sleep, but then he called me to come here.
-I'm really sorry. -Okay... okay.
-So sorry. -[whispering] It's okay. Thank you.
So many of you.
I'm sorry, I'm just having so much, uh...
-Yes. -[all chuckle]
[Gus] Uh... ah, okay.
Uh, hey, um, hang on...
I'm gonna put on a condom, all right?
I'm... I'm gonna put on a condom real quick, okay? [sighs]
-Excuse me. Sorry, pardon me. -Okay. [chuckles]
So, uh, you know, you two can, uh, kiss each other if you want, you know.
-Nah, that's okay. -No. We don't really want to.
-You're sure? Really? -[Reese] Yeah.
'Cause otherwise, it's not really, like, a threesome.
It's more like, you know, two adjacent twosomes or... [chuckles]
-Nah. It's not our thing. -No?
Oh, I see, it's sort of, like, um, I'm like the conduit.
We're sisters.
What the fuck? Jesus! Ew!
I mean, I'm sorry, I don't mean, "Ew," but just, like, what the fuck? Ew!
Relax. What's wrong?
You know, for most guys this would be, like, a fantasy.
What, to be, like, a participant in incest?
Whoa! [chuckles] Hey.
-This isn't incest, okay? -No.
We've never kissed. We haven't even touched each other.
translation.ko: 우린 키스도 안 하고 만지지도 않아

translation.en: Okay, yeah, but you're, like... [stutters] you know, naked in front of each other.
That's, like, in the realm of, you know, fucking incest.
So, was it incest when we had baths together as little girls?
translation.ko: 어릴 때 같이 목욕한 것도 그렇겠네

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. That is, like, worlds apart! Okay?
Like, I was touching your boob while I was touching her thigh, okay?
translation.ko: 언니 가슴 만지면서 동생 허벅지 만진 거잖아

translation.en: That's, technically, I'm--
I'm in an incestuous relationship right now, okay?
Don't judge us.
I'm not judging you, okay? It's just...
It's a surprise, and in all fairness...
you two should've told me.
Okay, dude. You know what? Sorry that we tried to fuck you.
No. I... I didn't mean it-- Uh, it's just...
I mean, maybe, like, one of you stays?
Go fuck yourself.
All right.
That'll be $2.35.
Shit. Fuck, dude, I don't have my wallet.
Can I pay you back later?
No, we don't do that.
Dude, I live, like, two blocks from here.
I'll run home, get money, come back, pay you.
I'll pay you more than I owe you. I'll give you a big tip.
translation.ko: 돈도 더 내고 팁도 후하게 줄게요

translation.en: No. You just go home, get your money,
translation.ko: 아뇨, 집에 가서 돈 챙긴 다음에

translation.en: then come back and get your coffee.
Dude, I fucking need this coffee right now, please, dude.
I need it to, like, you know, get shit going.
Please, please, do me a solid.
This isn't a charity.
If you not gonna pay it, just go. Get out.
translation.ko: 돈 안 낼 거면 그냥 나가요

translation.en: [stutters] What, you're just gonna let that coffee get cold?
You're just gonna waste that cup of coffee?
-Yeah. -That doesn't make any sense.
No, I'm fucking taking this coffee right now.
No, no, no, no, you stealing the coffee.
I'm calling the police. You're on the cameras.
translation.ko: 경찰 부를 거예요 이거 녹화되고 있어요

translation.en: -I'm on the cameras? Big fucking deal. -Yeah, yeah. It's--
Hi, hello. Fuck you. Fuck you. I don't care, you have me on the camera.
You know me, dude. I'm good for it. I'll come right back.
Hey, you know what? I got this. It's cool.
[cashier] Are you sure?
Yeah. Yeah, I'm sure.
[clicks tongue] Okay.
And a pack of cigarettes?
And a pack of smokes.
Parliaments.
